meanings.definition: A yellow citrus fruit with a sour taste.
meanings.sent1: I squeezed a lemon into my water for a refreshing flavor.
meanings.sent2: The lemon tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every summer.
meanings.sent3: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly picked lemon.
meanings.sent5: The tangy scent of lemon filled the kitchen as she baked a lemon cake.

meanings.definition: Something that is unsatisfactory or defective.
meanings.sent1: The old car turned out to be a real lemon, breaking down constantly.
meanings.sent2: He was disappointed when he realized the product he bought was a lemon.
meanings.sent3: The movie was such a lemon that we ended up laughing at its flaws.
meanings.sent4: Her excuse for being late was a lemon, full of holes.
meanings.sent5: The plan was a lemon, falling apart at the first sign of trouble.
